QuestData.Title: Asking for a Friend
QuestData.Description:
Hey! Since you helped Cesi I thought maybe you might do a favor for me.
Well, uh, y'see Miss Sweetflower over there? Sweet as honey, sharp as a tack, and cooks like a goddess.
I'm not much to look at, but the lady might think kindly on me if I could surprise her with a gift. A really great gift! But I can't leave m'post or these red-coated jerks might run off with the merchandise.
This is where you come in. Find out what Miss Sweetflower wants, get it and bring it back to me.
QuestData.LogDescription: Ask Xun Xun Sweetflower what she would like and acquire it in Anyport.
QuestData.RewardText: She wanted this?$b$b<Kane cracks open the jar slightly. His eyes begin to water immediately.>$b$bT-thanks.$b$b<Coughing, Kane hastily re-seals the jar.>$b$bThat must have cost a lot. Let me pay you back with a tip.
